text: Anthony Ramos Martinez (born November 1, 1991) is an American actor and singer. In 2015, he became known for his the dual roles of John Laurens and Philip Hamilton in the Broadway musical Hamilton. ==References== Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from New York City Category:American movie actors Category:American stage actors Category:American television actors Category:Singers from New York City
title: Anthony Ramos
